      T =3D de 0 a 1

      P =3D pu=
nto de control
      f(T) =3D P1 * (T^8) + P2 * (8T^7V) + P3 * (28T^6V^2) +=
 P4 * (56T^5V^3) +  P5 * (70T^4V^4) + P6 * (56T^3V^5) + P7 * (28T^2V^6) + P=
8 * (8TV^7) + P9 * (V^8)   ???

isiones-1)^2 * 2 ?
